title: John McCain's New Book
teaser: Arizona Senator John McCain joins Kathleen to talk about his new book," Thirteen Soldiers: A Personal History of Americans at War ." Mark Salter, the book's co-author, joins the program for the second half. Each chapter of the book recounts the experiences of a single American soldier, sailor, airman or marine in each of the thirteen major wars our country has fought. It is an evocative history of Americans at war, told through the personal accounts of soldiers who served in conflicts ranging from the Revolution to the wars in Iraq and Afghanistan. Through these individual experiences, McCain and Salter tell the larger story of the eternal verities of war throughout American history.
